End-of-life IT assets contain sensitive data and confidential information, intellectual property, customer lists, trade secrets, accounting information, payroll records or credit card information. If this information is compromised, your company’s reputation is at risk.

100% guaranteed data destruction

RIMECO offers data destruction solutions to destroy data on magnetic, solid state and optical media for small and large projects. Our secure data destruction services ensure all data is destroyed and irrecoverable, adheres to industry standards and includes all documentation required for regulatory and corporate compliance.

Data Destruction Services at RIMECO in Aabenraa, Denmark

RIMECO guarantees complete digital data destruction services and provides Certificates of Data Destruction and Certificates of Recycling as required.

Services

Bulk and Witnessed Data Destruction

RIMECO uses clearly defined processes, guided by industry and government standards to make certain all digital data is destroyed. Our audited processes provide peace of mind, accountability and assurance that your company’s privacy and corporate reputation remain intact. Certificates of Data Destruction provided.

Shredding 

Any data-bearing media that our clients do not want to reuse or resell is physically destroyed. RIMECO uses state-of-the-art, high-capacity shredders to destroy all data-bearing media. The entire hard drive, including platters is shredded into small pieces making it impossible to reconstruct the media or data.

Data Erasure

All shredded materials will pass extremely strong magnetic fields, which ensures a secure destruction of all data-bearing media.

Witnessed Destruction

Some situations require that clients physically witness the destruction of the electronic media. RIMECO can accommodate this witnessed destruction of hard drives and storage media by hosting the client at our processing facility. Alternatively, witnessing can be facilitated by providing a webcam link to witness the destruction remotely. We also can provide video recording of client hard drives being destroyed. Our witnessed hard drive destruction is useful for our clients to verify their media is destroyed and, in some instances, their hardware is destroyed under our brand protection services.

Certificates of Data Destruction

Certificates of Data Destruction can be provided, regardless of the service provided – data erasure, hard drive shredding or witnessed destruction.

Get A Quote

Contact us for a proposal at info@rimeco.dk
